input_args.text: '5   Hundreds of far-right protesters marched to Milan\'s Montello barracks on Monday, to protest the barrack\'s transformation into a refugee shelter. Supporters of regionalist political party Lega Nord and radical right group Casa Pound turned out to protest. The protesters chanted anti-refugee chants while marching with flares, numerous Italian and Casa Pound flags, and banners such as "Italians first"; "Defend Milan". COURTESY: RT\'s RUPTLY video agency, NO RE-UPLOAD, NO REUSE - FOR LICENSING, PLEASE, CONTACT http://ruptly.tv   Leave a Reply Login with your Social ID Your email address will not be published. Name'
